description: Retrieves the lists of resources and principals that associated for resource shares that you own.

parameters.name: associationType
parameters.description: Specifies whether you want to retrieve the associations that involve a specified resource or principal. PRINCIPAL --- list the principals whose associations you want to see. RESOURCE --- list the resources whose associations you want to see.

parameters.name: resourceShareArns
parameters.description: Specifies a list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resource share whose associations you want to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a resource whose resource shares you want to retrieve. You cannot specify this parameter if the association type is PRINCIPAL.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the principal whose resource shares you want to retrieve. This can be an Amazon Web Services account ID, an organization ID, an organizational unit ID, or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an individual IAM role or user. You cannot specify this parameter if the association type is RESOURCE.

nested_items.name: resourceShareAssociations
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain the details about the associations.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

nested_items.name: resourceShareName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: associatedEntity
nested_items.description: The associated entity. This can be either of the following:
For a resource association, this is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
For principal associations, this is one of the following:
The ID of an Amazon Web Services account.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization in Organizations.
The ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations.
The ARN of an IAM role.
The ARN of an IAM user.

nested_items.name: associationType
nested_items.description: The type of entity included in this association.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the association.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the association.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the association was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the association was last updated.

nested_items.name: external
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
